sentence: ‘You’re actually dumber than AOC.’ ‘Why are you so angry?’ Donate to my campaign to keep Josh Mandel’s hateful, sexist and racist rhetoric out of the Senate.https://t.co/RxdXFeviiB pic.twitter.com/egt7ImPlpy — Morgan Harper (@mh4oh) February 22, 2022 “Last night I debated Josh Mandel in Cleveland,” she said, “and we saw from him what we’ve come to expect, racism, sexism, xenophobia, this guy has no solutions for the real issues that everyday Ohioans are facing and certainly no solutions for the black community,” throwing down the race card.
author: Chris Donaldson
title: ‘Like AOC only dumber’: Ohio senate debate goes off the rails as racial hate turns to white Marine vet

sentence: (Video Credit: Fox News) Senate candidate Josh Mandel (R-OH) clapped back at leftist radicals and Black Lives Matter members who interrupted him and demanded that he leave a church in Cleveland because he is white during an off-the-rails debate with Democratic candidate Morgan Harper.
author: Terresa Monroe-Hamilton
title: Marine vet candidate puts BLM crowd in its place after being told to leave debate because he’s white

sentence: Washington (CNN)A new television ad from Ohio Republican Senate candidate Josh Mandel is centered on a false claim that Republican primary rival Mike Gibbons, a businessman, said that military service isn't "real work."

title: Fact check: Ad from Ohio Republican Josh Mandel falsely claims party rival Mike Gibbons said military service isn't real work

sentence: While there appears to be a significant color difference between Mandel’s face and his hands in the version that appeared in the campaign ad, this color difference is far less noticeable in the original photograph (at right in the tweet below): You folks asked if Josh Mandel’s campaign photoshopped his head onto a Black man, and I looked for answers.

sentence: (Josh Mandel for U.S. Senate) Fred Davis, a Republican consultant who creates ads for Mandel, told PolitiFact that the version of the image that showed up in the ad reflected efforts by the video editor to make sure the text directing viewers to the campaign’s "JoshMandel.com" web address showed up on the video.
author: Bill McCarthy
title: No evidence Josh Mandel photoshopped his face onto body of Black Marine for campaign ad

sentence: “There's nothing racist about stopping critical race theory and loving America.” Then a voiceover comes in: “Josh Mandel — pro-God, pro-gun, pro-Trump.” It dishonors the memories of Lewis and King to promote an agenda that will bring nothing but more harm to Black people at a site where they struggled for Black people’s advancement.
title: Conservatives' appropriation of MLK just reached a shocking new low
